About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Fresh software engineer with a passion for developing innovative programs that expedite the efficiency and effectiveness of organizational success. Well-versed in technology and writing code to create systems that are reliable and user-friendly.

Spark Solution

Web Developer - (03/2015-04/2016)

A startup company, and worked mainly on Windows Phone, Android, Azure Mobile Services and Cloud Databases. I did work as a front-end developer, I developed innovative and responsive designs.

EFU Insurance

Internee - (07/2017-09/2017)

EFU Life Assurance Ltd., originally Eastern Federal Union Insurance Company Limited, is a Pakistan-based life insurance company. I worked on the recruitment based project using oracle forms and reports.
